text: He imanadaragana, tomara sayatanera padanka anusarana karo na. Ye ke'u sayatanera padanka anusarana karabe, takhana to sayatana nirlajjata o manda kajera'i adesa karabe. Yadi allahara anugraha o daya tomadera prati na thakata, tabe tomadera ke'u kakhana'o pabitra hate parate na. Kintu allaha yake iccha pabitra karena. Allaha sabakichu sonena, janena.
